thread.title: BRIEF-Coheris H1 net loss narrows to 0.8 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Coheris H1 net loss narrows to 0.8 million euros

title: BRIEF-Coheris H1 net loss narrows to 0.8 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Coheris H1 net loss narrows to 0.8 million euros Sept 28 
Sept 28 Coheris SA : 
* Reports H1 net loss of 0.8 million euros ($898,320) compared to loss of 1.0 million euros a year ago 
* H1 operating loss is 0.8 million euros versus loss of 1.0 million euros a year ago 
* Says the positive impact of the move on the accounts will take full effect from H2 2015 Source text: bit.ly/1L0s9iU 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8906 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
